entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rancheria
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 March 2023
